messages.content: What is the main purpose of ComfyUI Color Image Detection nodes?

The main purpose of ComfyUI Color Image Detection nodes is to detect color in images, leveraging both RGB and LAB color spaces to distinguish between colored and black and white images, including those with color tints.
How can one install ComfyUI Color Image Detection nodes?

You can install ComfyUI Color Image Detection nodes by cloning the repo into the `ComfyUI/custom_nodes` folder or by using ComfyUI Manager. As an alternative, you can download the `.py` files into your `ComfyUI/custom_nodes` folder and ensure `requirements.txt` is installed for full functionality.
What is the strength and limitation of RGB Color Detection?
RGB Color Detection is more reliable for detecting color tints, but it operates slower compared to other methods.
What is the strength and limitation of LAB Color Detection?
LAB Color Detection offers faster processing times, but it may not be as effective for nuanced tint detection.
What features does ComfyUI Color Image Detection offer?

ComfyUI Color Image Detection offers customizable pixel percentage consideration for RGB Color Detection, which is especially useful for tinted images. LAB Color Detection uses the LAB color space, focusing on A and B channels differences to identify colored images and provides quicker analysis times.
